casebody.data:
UNITED STATES of America, Plaintiff-Appellee, v. FORDHAM SUGAR CO., Inc., Julius Cohen and Harry Schachter, Dofendants-Appellants. No. 385. Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit June 30, 1939. David V. Cahill and Joseph L. Strassburg, both of New York City, for appellants Fordham Sugar Co., Inc., and Julius Cohen. Bennett I. Schlessel, of New York City, for appellant Harry Schachter. John T. Cahill, U. S. Atty., of New York City (John K. Carroll, Asst. U. S. Atty., of New York City, of counsel), for the United States.

Before SWAN, AUGUSTUS N. HAND, and CLARK, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Judgment affirmed.
